Name: Crimsonflank Pigeon
Desc: A common avian species in Teyvat. Plump and meaty, but can also be trained to deliver messages.\nThis type of pigeon is mostly active in mountainous regions. It sports the colors of the mountain rocks and the red earth on its feathers, giving it a graceful and distinguished appearance. After a long time bathing in the sunlight of the Realm Within, the brilliant posture of the Crimsonflank Pigeon can even attract the light-loving Sun Crabs.
